name: Mixing Station Wing
description: This app allows you to remote control the Behringer WING digital mixer.   Features: - RTA overlay in PEQ /GEQ view - Peq preview in channel strip - High contrast mode for outdoor usage - Popgroups - Access to all FX and processing blocks - Create unlimited DCA groups (IDCAs) - Customizable layers, channel order and mutegroup labels - Up to 32 channels visible channels per layer - Much more :-)   Compatible mixer: - Behringer WING
